                      op='==',

                            )
                          args=
                            ExprList(
                              exprs[0]=
                                BinaryOp(

                                    ArrayRef(

                                          name='case1',
                                        )

                                          value='1',
                                        )
                                    )
                                  right=

                                      name=
                                        ID(
                                          name='case2',
                                        )
                                      subscript=
                                        Constant(

                                          value='1',
                                        )
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='1',
                        )
                    )
                )
              right=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='&&',
                  left=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='case1',
                            )
                          subscript=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='1',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='case2',
                            )
                          subscript=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='1',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  right=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        FuncCall(
                          name=

                            )
                          args=
                            ExprList(
                              exprs[0]=

                                  op='-',
                                  left=

                                        )

              block_items[1]=

                  op='=',

                      name='node',

              name='printf',

          args=

                )
            )
        )
    )
)
